|Intitle=Clinical iconography of a typical example of a parotid tumour complicated by PFP
|Description=Visualisation of parotid tumour invasion suggesting tumour-induced PFP
|Rubric=Multimedia content
|Contributors=
|Order=13}}
Please refer to the CEN website: www.cen-neurologie.fr where videos are available.

question.question: What is the typical presentation of a parotid tumour complicated by Parotid Fascial Paralysis (PFP)?
question.option_a: A large, slow-growing tumour in the parotid gland
question.option_b: A small, rapidly growing tumour in the parotid gland
question.option_c: A benign tumour in the parotid gland
question.option_d: A malignant tumour in the parotid gland
